headline: $451.8 Bn Paper and Paperboard Packaging Market by Grade, Type, Source, Pulping, Application, & Region - Global Forecast to 2030
summary: The global paper and paperboard packaging market, valued at USD 379.9 billion in 2024, is projected to reach USD 451.8 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 2.9%. This rise is fueled by increasing environmental consciousness, regulatory bans on single-use plastics, and the expansion of e-commerce necessitating eco-friendly packaging. The glassine & greaseproof segment leads with the highest growth, favored for its sustainable, food-safe properties. Flexible paper also shows strong growth, meetin
